posts.body:
>>316e6461-b2ec-4055-9818-527af18b9596
likewise
also is there way to single out just /monster for auto-seeding? I know you can for the site so I was wondering about here

>>1890d7b8-a92d-4f88-bbfb-320a3582c5db
so /monster/ is auto-DL'd and auto-seeded in its entirety once I hit [pin]? no other steps?

>>e58eacd7-6680-4367-bf80-4d71ea052d78
Isn't that how it was before? Or is that what the [seed] button was for?

>>a2de4dda-5cd0-472a-9b4b-85bfb5c484e3
Nice
okay last question: I'm going to continue seeding what I have downloaded as long as my ZN server is running, regardless of if I navigate away from the page?

>>aa3f4669-a099-4977-a73f-4fcf25bf978d
why is this the only thread all of a sudden?
